member.name: P:Dnn.EditBar.Library.Items.BaseMenuItem.Text
member.summary: the menu's text, when template set value, this will be ignored.

member.name: P:Dnn.EditBar.Library.Items.BaseMenuItem.Template
member.summary: the content will render as the menu item.

member.name: P:Dnn.EditBar.Library.Items.BaseMenuItem.Parent
member.summary: parent which the menu item will stay in. currently we have LeftMenu and RightMenu defined in edit bar. if the edit bar modified and add new position, this value can extend with more values.

member.name: P:Dnn.EditBar.Library.Items.BaseMenuItem.Loader
member.summary: the menu script path, which will handle the button click event.

member.name: M:Dnn.EditBar.Library.Items.BaseMenuItem.Visible
member.summary: whether the menu is visible in current context.
